Desc.eng: Look at that kettle! It's steaming hot! Time to defrost my goldfish.
That's a good idea. Let's see what happens.
A good turn deserves another! I grant you one wish.
No, not again! How I hate these misconceptions! Miserable storytellers, always exaggerating... One wish! That’s all. Deal with it.
We could still do wonders with one wish. How about everlasting peace in...
That’s all? I was really afraid you’d wish for a pony. Here you are and good bye!
